attributes.action: review policy on banning people from entering the country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We were outraged to learn the Geert Wilders, a member of the EU, had been prevented from entering the country yesterday on the grounds that his presence would endager public security.

Yet the very people he is allegedly insulting take to the streets of London waving banners carrying threats such as "Exterminate those who slander Islam", "Be prepared for the real holocaust" and "Europe you will pay, your annihilation is on it's way"

We ask the Prime Minister to carefully reconsider who is the greatest threat to national security and be very careful about who is accepted and who is denied access to the country in future.

rejection.details: The Prime Minister is unable to comment on individual cases. You should forward your concerns onto the Home Office.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
